entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Near blizzard developing in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending before morning then a few clouds. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High minus 28. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 32.
